headline.print_headline: Delta Jet Returns to Jamaica After Fluid Leak
headline.main: Delta Jet Returns to Jamaica After Fluid Leak

docs.snippet: A Delta Airlines jet was forced to return to the airport in Jamaica shortly after takeoff Monday because of an apparent mechanical problem in one of its engines, the company said....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Delta Airlines jet was forced to return to the airport in Jamaica shortly after takeoff Monday because of an apparent mechanical problem in one of its engines, the company said.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Asks North Korea to Release Two Detained Americans
headline.main: U.S. Asks North Korea to Release Two Detained Americans

docs.snippet: The U.S. State Department, citing "humanitarian concerns," asked North Korea on Monday to release two Americans who North Korean official media said would be put on trial for committing crimes against the state....
docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. State Department, citing "humanitarian concerns," asked North Korea on Monday to release two Americans who North Korean official media said would be put on trial for committing crimes against the state.

headline.print_headline: Nationals Reinstate Star OF Bryce Harper From DL
headline.main: Nationals Reinstate Star OF Bryce Harper From DL

docs.snippet: Washington Nationals outfielder Bryce Harper came back from a lengthy stint on the disabled list Monday and didn't shy away from expressing how he thinks manager Matt Williams should address the lineup questions posed by his return....
docs.lead_paragraph: Washington Nationals outfielder Bryce Harper came back from a lengthy stint on the disabled list Monday and didn't shy away from expressing how he thinks manager Matt Williams should address the lineup questions posed by his return.

docs.snippet: Agnieszka Radwanska, the 2012 Wimbledon runner-up, lost in the fourth round to 22nd-seeded Ekaterina Makarova of Russia 6-3, 6-0 Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Agnieszka Radwanska, the 2012 Wimbledon runner-up, lost in the fourth round to 22nd-seeded Ekaterina Makarova of Russia 6-3, 6-0 Monday.

headline.print_headline: Pensions Group Opposes Sports Direct Bonus Share Plan
headline.main: Pensions Group Opposes Sports Direct Bonus Share Plan

docs.snippet: A group of UK public sector pensions recommended on Monday that its member funds oppose Sports Direct's planned 2015 bonus share scheme, citing concerns over the sports retailer's remuneration of its chief executive officer....
docs.lead_paragraph: A group of UK public sector pensions recommended on Monday that its member funds oppose Sports Direct's planned 2015 bonus share scheme, citing concerns over the sports retailer's remuneration of its chief executive officer.

headline.print_headline: Obama Says to Reform Immigration on His Own, Bypassing Congress
headline.main: Obama Says to Reform Immigration on His Own, Bypassing Congress

docs.snippet: President Barack Obama said on Monday he would take executive action to revamp the U.S. immigration system and move additional resources to protect the border after hopes of passing broad reform legislation in Congress officially died....
docs.lead_paragraph: President Barack Obama said on Monday he would take executive action to revamp the U.S. immigration system and move additional resources to protect the border after hopes of passing broad reform legislation in Congress officially died.

headline.print_headline: Review: Thicke May Win Wife Back With 'Paula'
headline.main: Review: Thicke May Win Wife Back With 'Paula'

headline.print_headline: San Francisco Transit Workers Reach Tentative Deal
headline.main: San Francisco Transit Workers Reach Tentative Deal

docs.snippet: The San Francisco transit agency says it has reached a tentative agreement on a new contract with its union whose workers took part in a sickout that stalled the city's famed cable cars and disrupted other services....
docs.lead_paragraph: The San Francisco transit agency says it has reached a tentative agreement on a new contract with its union whose workers took part in a sickout that stalled the city's famed cable cars and disrupted other services.

headline.print_headline: Champion Murray in a Hurry on Center Court
headline.main: Champion Murray in a Hurry on Center Court

docs.snippet: Young gun Grigor Dimitrov stands between Andy Murray and the Wimbledon semi-finals and the champion is clearly wary of the Bulgarian he describes as "coming into his prime"....
docs.lead_paragraph: Young gun Grigor Dimitrov stands between Andy Murray and the Wimbledon semi-finals and the champion is clearly wary of the Bulgarian he describes as "coming into his prime".

headline.print_headline: Fired Lesbian Police Chief in South Carolina Gets Her Job Back
headline.main: Fired Lesbian Police Chief in South Carolina Gets Her Job Back

docs.snippet: A South Carolina police chief who said the mayor fired her because she is gay returned to work on Monday after being reinstated by the town council....
docs.lead_paragraph: A South Carolina police chief who said the mayor fired her because she is gay returned to work on Monday after being reinstated by the town council.
